alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Jasper; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:03PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 302 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Switzerland, or near Ridgeland, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Bluffton, Ridgeland, Jasper, Hardeeville, Calawassie Island, Pritchardville, Rose Hill and Sun City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
